column4: Using Intrepid, I have a digiatl camera, is there a place I can set that camera up for use with Intrepid?
Or can I just plug it in and have it work?
I would assume your camera simply acts as a usb storage device when plugged in, in which case you can just plug it in and browse like any other filesystem.
yes, it acts as a usb device, so I'm good. Thanks
